p: In a related analysis, poor adherence limits virologic control and a loss of immunological and clinical improvement [ 13]. Our findings corroborate this study where we also observed that patientâ€™s development of active TB disease was prevented because adherence level was 89%. Adherence counseling before IPT along with adherence monitoring for ART was one way to determine readiness to start and complete treatment. Although patients with slightly less than 95% adherence completed, their treatment duration was elongated proportionate to the missed doses before completion outcome was entered for the patient. In this study, adherence was operationally defined to mean taking drugs every day as prescribed by the health worker.
